//: This file configures the Claude Code CLI runtime for use within Gastown.
It should be copied to the .claude/ directory within a specific Gastown rig (project).
The 'startup_inject_files' key is a setting that instructs the Claude runtime to load the specified files into the agent's context upon session startup.
This ensures that every 'Polecat' agent receives the full 'Context Trinity' to prevent license contamination and architectural drift.
